mapper.insert: INSERT INTO car(car_num, brand, guide_price, produce_time, car_type) VALUES(#{carNum}, #{brand}, #{guidePrice}, #{produceTime}, #{carType})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM car WHERE id in(${ids})
mapper.select: SELECT id, car_num as carNum, brand, guide_price as guidePrice, produce_time as produceTime, car_type as carType FROM car WHERE car_type = #{carType}
